alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Howard; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:52PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Buffalo, southeastern Sherman and southwestern Howard Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1152 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ravenna, or 26 miles northeast of Kearney, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Boelus around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Farwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central and central Nebraska.
